effect.sun-moon: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This Pokémon does not take damage from weather.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Protects the Pokémon from things like sand, hail, and powder.
